snippet.title: ROIDERS Trailer
snippet.description:
Become an asteroid miner and loot your way to supremacy! Fight waves of vicious aliens or battle against your friends.

ROIDERS on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2912100/ROIDERS

Our Website:
https://melonic.games
